languages.text: Кунрад Войгтвир остался на месте событий, чтобы лично разобраться в причинах инцидента с сервитором. Нужно добраться до площадки с астрономической моделью, где ожидает Теодора фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Кунрад Войгтвир остался на месте событий, чтобы лично разобраться в причинах инцидента с дикой тварью. Нужно добраться до площадки с астрономической моделью, где ожидает Теодора фон Валанциус.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.
languages.original_text: Кунрад Войгтвир остался на месте событий, чтобы лично разобраться в причинах инцидента с сервитором. Нужно добраться до площадки с астрономической моделью, где ожидает Теодора фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the xenobeast incident to personally investigate the reasons behind it. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.
Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the xenobeast incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.
Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the xenobeast incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir hat beschlossen, am Ort des Vorfalls mit dem Servitor zu bleiben und persönlich die Ursache zu ermitteln. Theodora von Valancius befindet sich im Planetarium und darf nicht warten gelassen werden.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir hat beschlossen, am Ort des Vorfalls mit der Xenobestie zu bleiben und persönlich die Ursache zu ermitteln. Theodora von Valancius befindet sich im Planetarium und darf nicht warten gelassen werden.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir a décidé de rester sur les lieux de l'incident lié au servitor afin d'enquêter personnellement sur la situation. Théodora von Valancius est au planétaire : il ne faut pas la faire attendre.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir a décidé de rester sur les lieux de l'incident lié à la xénobête afin d'enquêter personnellement sur la situation. Théodora von Valancius est au planétaire : il ne faut pas la faire attendre.

languages.text: 昆拉德·维特威尔决定留在机仆袭击现场，亲自调查事故原因。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯在星象仪处等你，不要让她久等。
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

traits.locale_text: 昆拉德·维特威尔决定留在异兽袭击现场，亲自调查事故原因。西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯在星象仪处等你，不要让她久等。

languages.text: クンラッド・ボイトヴィルはサーヴィター事件の現場に留まり、その原因を個人的に調査することにした。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは天球儀のもとにいる。彼女を待たせてはいけない。
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

traits.locale_text: クンラッド・ボイトヴィルはサーヴィター事件の現場に留まり、その原因を個人的に調査することにした。シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは天球儀のもとにいる。彼女を待たせてはいけない。

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir ha decidido quedarse en el lugar del incidente del servidor a investigar personalmente lo sucedido. Theodora von Valancius está en el planetario y no hay que hacerle esperar.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir ha decidido quedarse en el lugar del incidente de la xenobestia a investigar personalmente lo sucedido. Theodora von Valancius está en el planetario y no hay que hacerle esperar.

languages.text: Kunrad Voigtvir, hizmetör hadisesinin sebebini bizzat araştırmak için olay mahallinde kalmaya karar verdi. Theodora von Valancius gökevinde ve bekletilmeyi hiç sevmez.
languages.original_text: Kunrad Voigtvir has decided to remain at the scene of the servitor incident to personally investigate the cause. Theodora von Valancius is at the orrery: she must not be kept waiting.

traits.locale_text: Kunrad Voigtvir, hizmetör hadisesinin sebebini bizzat araştırmak için olay mahallinde kalmaya karar verdi. Theodora von Valancius gökevinde ve bekletilmeyi hiç sevmez.
